channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Damaged crossing, 27th December
item.description:
Area is bit of a mess - damaged crossing, unfinished works(?), plastic barriers - can any repairs be completed please??

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 2, High Street, Anerley, City of London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Loose man hole cover making a lot of noise outside Serica Court Care home, 27th December
item.description:
This section of Greenwich High Road was recently resurfaced but the man hole cover next to the crossing between Serica Court and the shopping area opposite was not replaced correctly. Every time a vehicle drives over it the cover makes a very load noise and it clearly needs to be refitted properly. It is disturbing residents at Serica Care Home.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Greenwich High Road, Greenwich
Report on FixMyStreet

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Parish Lane, Penge, Greater London

item.title: Flying tipping and rubbish, 27th December
item.description:
Help is needed to address the problem of rubbish and fly tipping in this place. It happens most of the time. People that engage in this act are oblivious of the consequences it has on others and environment. Also not aware that it takes someone to report the mess they done for it to be removed.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Salhouse Close, Thamesmead
Report on FixMyStreet
